>Archmages have chain-lightning and it is so badly coded that it isn't
>funny.  Chain lightning will basically slow down any computer (trust
>me, I've tried it with 1 ghz and 128 meg of RAM) to a halt if you use
>it against more than 15-20 opponents.

Perhaps a single, deadly lightning strike then? Problem would be targeting, 
this doesn't exactly use a similar interface to BG or IWD:HoW which are the 
only games I know of to make use of the AD&D spells and rulesets.
